reviewText: I bought this for my  3 year old son who loves spiderman.  However, it's less about spiderman and more about inappropriate language, cleavage, tight outfits and sexual innuendo or spiderman directly making out with women.  An oh yeah, let's not forget spiderman's latte and martini drinking buddy.  What a pathetic video.  Obivously created by some attention starved techno-geeks who sought to create a sexual adventure dream world.  Suprised Marvel put their  name on this.
Purchased DVD for grandson who is Spiderman fan.  This is not his favorite but he enjoys watching it once in a while.

I was very disappointed in this movie.  My young grandson loves Spiderman and Superman movies.  I purchased this DVD for his birthday.  However, after viewing this movie, I found this animated version to have inappropriate language throughout.  I cannot recommend this movie to other parents or grandparents.

I LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOVE IT, THEN AGAIN, WHO WOULDN'T, IT IS SPIDER-MAN!!!!!!!!!!!!! THIS IS MY FAVIROTE HIGH FLYING, GREAT WEBSLINGING ADVENTURE EVER!!!!!!!!!!!! AND, IF I COULD, I WOULD GIVE IT AS MANY STARS AS THERE ARE IN THE UNIVERSE! I HAVE BEEN ENTICED RIGHT OUT OF MY SEAT AND INTO THE WORLD OF MARVEL, I EVEN FIND MYSELF WISHING FICTION WERE REAL- SUPER-HEROES, AND VILLAINS, BUT WHICH ONE WOULD I BE, ONLY I KNOW.
Great service! There is nothing that needs to be improved at all. Will buy from again sometime in the near future.
marvel fan, I watch everything I can find and collect all as well. Worth getting for an marvel fan to add to a collection.
GREAT ITEM AT A GREAT PRICE
this movie has 3 episodes from the show. they are pretty good.i think i'll just buy the whole series than watching bits and pices of it. still get a good movie/tv show dvd.
The dvd was good as far as it goes. My grandson loved it. My only complaint would be that it is pretty short (64 minutes) for what it cost.
Don't buy if the person is over 15. It's not bad but it has non- explisit "sexual" content. Also the scenes change very rapidly, it s very hard to follow.
my son loves spiderman. the cartoon animated series is cool. I can only encourage you to get them. good quality cartoons, and nice adventure stories. not only for kids
